General.Name: Norsyn Crop Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Norsyn Crop Technology Co., Ltd. engages in the research, development, production, and sale of pesticide preparation products in China. The company offers insecticides, fungicides, herbicides, and other products. Norsyn Crop Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2006 and is based in Xi'an, China.

1.Name: Mr. Jiang  Yuan
1.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Sec. of the Board & Director
